name: House: The Arrival
description:
You need to enter a HOUSE because you just lost a bet with one of your friend. Will you enter the house? OR LEAVE?

Controls:

 Up, Left, Right, Down - Control the player

Enter - Interact

Shift - Run

Esc - Pause

Note: This is my first ever ever RPG Maker game, i've not experience with this game engine at all UwU. And, this game is type of RPG Maker horror back then (Ao Oni, lb, etc). If you found any bugs, wrong grammar, or have suggestion please contact me via discord or just leave a comment. Okay, thats all enjoy the game!

PS: oh, if you like the game. Please leave a donation, it will mean alot to buy me RPG Maker MV or MZ because im still using the VX Ace trial and i have 2k3k. I wanted to use MV or MZ so i can improve my engine. Anyways, thank you UwU here the link for donation saweria (didnt support paypal because i will bought it with my currency)
